Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\dashboard\models.go:286:6: exported: type name will be used as dashboard.DashboardWidget by other packages, and that stutters; consider calling this Widget (revive)
basic_test.go:18:5: SA4000: identical expressions on the left and right side of the '!=' operator (staticcheck)
internal\compliance\framework.go:14:6: exported: type name will be used as compliance.ComplianceFramework by other packages, and that stutters; consider calling this Framework (revive)
internal\compliance\data_mapper.go:347:6: exported: type name will be used as compliance.ComplianceViolation by other packages, and that stutters; consider calling this Violation (revive)
